wave_0_per_point1=

wave_0_per_point5=
wave_0_per_point6=t1 = t1 + value1 * 100;
wave_0_per_point7=
wave_0_per_point8=barvalue = if(equal(bar,0),t1,barvalue);
wave_0_per_point9=t1 = if(equal(bar,0),0,t1);
wave_0_per_point10=
wave_0_per_point11=// bar coloring...
wave_0_per_point12=r = bar * t3;
wave_0_per_point13=g = sin((bar * t3) * 3.1415);
wave_0_per_point14=b = 1 - r;
wave_0_per_point15=
wave_0_per_point16=// black color above barvalue
wave_0_per_point17=r = if(above(bar,barvalue),0,r);
wave_0_per_point18=g = if(above(bar,barvalue),0,g);
wave_0_per_point19=b = if(above(bar,barvalue),0,b);
wave_0_per_point20=
wave_0_per_point21=// draw zero-line-ish thing
wave_0_per_point22=r = if(equal(1,bar),0,r);
wave_0_per_point23=g = if(equal(1,bar),0,g);
wave_0_per_point24=b = if(equal(1,bar),1,b);
wave_0_per_point25=
wave_0_per_point26=// Try to not draw diagonal line... not working really....
wave_0_per_point27=a = if(equal(bar,t2-1),0,1);
wave_0_per_point28=a = if(equal(bar,0),0,1);
wave_0_per_point29=
wave_0_per_point30=// bar height
wave_0_per_point31=meter = (bar + odd) * 0.001953125 * t4;
wave_0_per_point32=
wave_0_per_point33=// Draw it
wave_0_per_point34=y = if(equal(bar,0),0.1,0.1 + meter);
wave_0_per_point35=x = (xstep - odd) * t2 * 0.001953125;

per_frame_init_1=p1 = int(rand(16));
per_frame_init_2=p2 = p1;
per_frame_1=dec_med = pow (0.96, 30/fps);
per_frame_2=dec_slow = pow (0.99, 30/fps);
per_frame_3=beat = max (max (bass, mid), treb); 
per_frame_4=avg = avg*dec_slow + beat*(1-dec_slow);
per_frame_5=is_beat = above(beat, .4+avg+peak) * above (time, t0+.2);
per_frame_6=t0 = is_beat*time + (1-is_beat)*t0;
per_frame_7=peak = is_beat * beat + (1-is_beat)*peak*dec_med;
per_frame_8=index = (index + is_beat) %8;
per_frame_9=index2 = (index2 + is_beat*bnot(index))%4;
per_frame_10=index3 = (index3 + is_beat*bnot(index)*bnot(index2))%3;
per_frame_11=
per_frame_12=
per_frame_13=q20 = avg;
per_frame_14=q21 = beat;
per_frame_15=q22 = peak;
per_frame_16=q23 = index;
per_frame_17=q24 = is_beat;
per_frame_18=q26 = bass + mid + treb;
per_frame_19=
per_frame_20=//k1 =  is_beat*bnot(index)*bnot(index2);
per_frame_21=
per_frame_22=k1 =  is_beat*equal(index,0);
per_frame_23=p1 =  k1*(p1+1) + (1-k1)*p1;
per_frame_24=p2 = dec_med * p2+ (1-dec_med)*p1;
per_frame_25=rott = p2 * 3.14159265359/4;
per_frame_26=
per_frame_27=q27 = 8-index;
per_frame_28=q28 = sin(time/7);
per_frame_29=q29 = index4;
per_frame_30=
per_frame_31=q1 = cos(rott);
per_frame_32=q2 = sin(rott);
per_frame_33=q3 = -q2;
per_frame_34=q4 = q1;
per_frame_35=
per_frame_36=mv_a = .5 * q1;
per_frame_37=
per_frame_38=movez = movez + .01 * 30/fps ;
per_frame_39=q29 = movez;
per_frame_40=
per_frame_41=movex = movex + .003 * 30/fps *q2;
per_frame_42=q30 = movex;
per_frame_43=
per_frame_44=q31 = sqr(sin(time/17));
per_frame_45=q32 = sqr(cos(time/17));
per_frame_46=
per_frame_47=zoom = 1.0;
per_frame_48=rot = .0;
per_frame_49=dx = .0;
per_frame_50=warp = .2;
